sections.title: What Are Cookies
sections.p: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and enable certain features to work properly.

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
sections.p: We use cookies for the following purposes:

sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.p: Essential Cookies

sections.title: Essential Cookies
sections.p: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like authentication and security.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.p: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website. This helps us improve our services.

sections.title: Affiliate Cookies
sections.p: These cookies help us track affiliate sales and ensure proper commission payments to our partners.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.p: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.p: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages, such as:

sections.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.p: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.p: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at privacy@labeuromed.com.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.p: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.p: We use the information we collect to:
liElements: Communicate with you about your orders

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.p: We share your information with:
liElements: Service providers who assist in our operations

sections.title: Data Security
sections.p: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.p: You have the right to:

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.p: By accessing and using Labeuromed's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.title: Medical Products and Prescriptions
sections.p: All purchases require a valid doctor's prescription. You must provide accurate prescription information and comply with all applicable medical regulations.

sections.title: Ordering and Payment
sections.p: By placing an order, you:
liElements: Confirm that all information provided is accurate
Agree to pay the full amount specified
Authorize us to process your payment

sections.title: Affiliate Program
sections.p: Our affiliate program is subject to the following terms:
liElements: Commissions are paid according to our affiliate agreement
We reserve the right to modify commission rates
Fraudulent activities will result in immediate termination

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.p: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Labeuromed and is protected by copyright laws.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.p: Labeuromed is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.p: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

sections.title: Contact
sections.p: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@labeuromed.com.
